CustomField.formula: IF ( (NOT(ISBLANK(RegistrationStatusCode__c)) && RegistrationStatusCode__c != '200') , IF ( UserFacingError__c , RegistrationDetail2__c , "An error occurred, Sales Enablement has been notified and will be in touch with you shortly.") , IF ((NOT(ISBLANK( OSSKeysStatusCode__c)) && OSSKeysStatusCode__c != '200') ,IF ( UserFacingError__c , OSSKeysDetail__c , "An error occurred, Sales Enablement has been notified and will be in touch with you shortly.") ,IF ((NOT(ISBLANK( CPQKeysStatusCode__c )) && CPQKeysStatusCode__c != '200') ,IF ( UserFacingError__c , CPQKeysDetail__c , "An error occurred, Sales Enablement has been notified and will be in touch with you shortly.") ,IF ((NOT(ISBLANK( CPQSubStatusCode__c )) && CPQSubStatusCode__c != '200') ,IF ( UserFacingError__c , CPQSubDetail__c , "An error occurred, Sales Enablement has been notified and will be in touch with you shortly.") ,"" ))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The message that will be displayed to the user
CustomField.label: User Error Message
